Name: [Chilla's Art] Onryo | 怨霊
About the game: From the creators of / / / Onryo | 怨霊 is a survival action horror game set in Japan. Your mission is to exorcise the haunted house by killing enemies with a special camera. We recommend you wear headphones. Without it, it will be extremely hard to tell where the ghosts are. The game can be difficult for some players. Be patient and observe enemy patterns and behaviors. The playtime is around 90 ~ 120 minutes long, depending on your skill and playstyle. Save system : We finally have a save system. Immersive experience : An atmospheric, realistic graphics intensifies the horror experience. Japanese Theme : Japanese horror films inspired environment. Camera-based action : You use a special camera to defeat enemies. Exploration : As you explore the house and uncover its secrets, you'll be faced with puzzles.
